title: Beacon of Hope
content:
Baldur's Gate 3. Beacon of Hope is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

BG3 Beacon of Hope Information

Description: Your allies will regain the maximum hit points possible when healed. They also gain Advantage on Wisdom Saving Throws and Death Saving Throws. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Abjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 9m Requires Concentration: Yes Savi
